snapshot.header.subtitleHtml: Discover the charm and comfort of our USA bed and breakfast.
snapshot.header.title: Chef Pierre FAQs
snapshot.sections.0.faqs.0.answer: We offer a variety of dining experiences including private dining, wine tastings, and chef's table experiences.
snapshot.sections.0.faqs.0.question: What types of dining experiences are available?
snapshot.sections.0.faqs.1.answer: Reservations are recommended and can be made up to 30 days in advance.
snapshot.sections.0.faqs.1.question: What are the reservation policies?
snapshot.sections.0.faqs.2.answer: Yes, we have a smart casual dress code.
snapshot.sections.0.faqs.2.question: Is there a dress code?
snapshot.sections.0.faqs.3.answer: Yes, we offer romantic dining packages and group dining experiences.
snapshot.sections.0.faqs.3.question: Do you offer any special dining packages?
snapshot.sections.0.faqs.4.answer: Cancellations must be made 24 hours in advance to avoid a fee.
snapshot.sections.0.faqs.4.question: What is your cancellation policy?
snapshot.sections.0.faqs.5.answer: Yes, we can accommodate various dietary needs including vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, and nut-free options.
snapshot.sections.0.faqs.5.question: Do you offer any dietary accommodations?
snapshot.sections.0.title: Dining Experience
